created.title: Project created
created.description:
The project was created successfully! 
You can now add a POU to your project to start working in OpenPLC Editor

directoryNotEmpty.title: Directory is not empty
directoryNotEmpty.description: The folder chosen isn't empty. You can't use it for a new project!

internalError.title: Failed to create file
internalError.description: Unable to create new project files
